name: df-prv
body: |- wceq(cprv, copab(s0, s1, wceq(co(cv(s0), csate, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cmap, com))))
comment: Define the "proves" relation on a set. A wff is true in a model ` M ` if for every valuation ` s e. ( M ^m _om ) ` , the interpretation of the wff using the membership relation on ` M ` is true. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
